Metadata.title: Hypatia Community
Metadata.description: A young, dynamic and inspiring community.

Hero.description: We create social impact projects to support quality and accessible education, ensure gender equality, and empower youth and women.

About.title: Who We Are
About.subtitle: We are a team that believes in education, equality, and social benefit; we create together and grow together.
About.pageSubtitle: We are a young and dynamic community shaping technology, creating together, and building the future.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description1: Hypatia is a community that advocates for gender equality, promotes quality and accessible education, and develops social responsibility projects that create real impact led by youth and women.
mission.description2: By building a solidarity network from local to global, we ensure that individuals are not just participants but active agents of change.
mission.aboutPageDesc1: Our mission at Hypatia is to bring together every young person interested in technology and design to maximize their potential. Through project-based learning methodology, we offer our members the opportunity to solve real-world problems and enrich their portfolios.
mission.aboutPageDesc2: We encourage our members from different disciplines to work collaboratively, enabling them to develop both their technical skills and teamwork competencies.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description1: Hypatia aims to be a global movement led by youth and women who shape the future.
vision.description2: Our goal is to build a future where education is accessible, equality becomes the norm, and collective power makes a sustainable world possible.
vision.description3: With this vision, we will continue to empower future generations and lead a more inclusive, fair, and hopeful social transformation.

Values.title: Our Values
Values.subtitle: The core principles that define us.

empowerment.title: Empowering Women and Youth
empowerment.description: Youth and women dream, take action, and inspire.

education.title: Quality and Accessible Education
education.description: Every child should be empowered with an education that provides confidence and carries hope.

equality.title: Gender Equality
equality.description: Gender is not meant to silence our voices; it's meant to celebrate our diversity.

innovation.title: Innovation and Creativity
innovation.description: We encourage curiosity that pushes boundaries and pursues new and original ideas.

collaboration.title: Collaboration and Community
collaboration.description: We believe success flourishes in a supportive environment where different talents come together.

learning.title: Continuous Learning
learning.description: We keep pace with technology and see every project as an opportunity to improve ourselves.

Projects.title: Our Projects
Projects.allProjectsSubtitle: The complete list of projects brought to life by our community.

JoinForm.title: Join Our Community
JoinForm.subtitle: Take the first step to become a part of Hypatia by filling out the form below.

JoinForm.reason: Why do you want to join?

Footer.description: We create social impact projects to support quality and accessible education, ensure gender equality, and empower youth and women.

Footer.networkDescription: Meet young leaders across Turkey, participate in our projects, and create social impact.

CTA.ctaDescription: We can't wait to develop amazing projects with passionate people like you.

PrivacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
PrivacyPolicy.intro: At Hypatia Community, we value your privacy. This text summarizes what data we collect when you use our website, how we use it, and your rights.

dataCollected.title: Data Collected
dataCollected.description: We may collect information such as name, surname, email address, school/city that you provide through contact forms, application forms, or email. Additionally, technical data related to your site usage (device, browser, IP, etc.) may be processed to a limited extent.

dataUsage.title: Data Usage
dataUsage.description: We use data to evaluate applications, provide feedback, communicate community announcements, and improve service quality.

dataSharing.title: Data Sharing
dataSharing.description: We do not share your personal data with third parties for marketing purposes. No sharing is done except for legal obligations or technical providers necessary to deliver the service.

retention.title: Retention Period
retention.description: Data is retained for the period required by the processing purpose and deleted in accordance with relevant legal regulations.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.description: You can contact us to exercise your rights to access, correct, delete, and object to your personal data.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: For your questions, you can reach us at {email}.

Terms.title: Terms of Use
Terms.intro: By using this website, you agree to the following terms. If you do not accept these terms, please do not use the site.

scope.title: Scope of Service
scope.description: Hypatia Community provides information about community events and projects. Content is for informational purposes and may be changed without prior notice.

userResponsibilities.title: User Responsibilities
userResponsibilities.description: You agree to use the site in accordance with applicable laws and not to share misleading or harmful content.

intellectualProperty.title: Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.description: Site content, texts, and images belong to Hypatia Community or are used with permission. They may not be reproduced without written permission.

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.description: Reasonable efforts are made for the accuracy of site content; however, content is not guaranteed to be complete or error-free.

changes.title: Changes
changes.description: These terms may be updated from time to time. Updates take effect as soon as they are published on this page.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: For your questions, you can reach us at {email}.
